text: Cameron Saul (born 28 June 1995) is an English footballer who plays as a forward for Finn Harps in the League of Ireland Premier Division. ==Career== === Youth === Saul started his career with Luton Town academy aged 12 having impressed playing with his school team. After failing to make the breakthrough in to the first team, he moved on to non-league side Wingate & Finchley. After two years with the club, Saul left to take a scholarship opportunity in America. Saul attended three universities in the United States, and graduated in 2018. Upon graduation, he signed for Greenville Triumph of the USL in 2019. ==Professional== === Greenville Triumph === Saul played 18 games and scored 4 goals as Greenville Triumph finished in 3rd place in the regular season, before going on to lose the final of the play-offs to North Texas in October 2019.https://www.uslleagueone.com/northtexassc-greenvilletriumphsc-2032747 === Finn Harps === Saul signed for Finn Harps in the League of Ireland Premier Division for the 2020 season on the 19 February 2020. Saul made his debut against Cork City https://www.extratime.ie/articles/24470/finn-harps-unveil- signing-of-forward-cameron-saul/ ==References== ==External links== * * * Profile at Lenoir-Rhyne Athletics Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Young Harris Mountain Lions men's soccer players Category:Greenville Triumph SC players Category:USL League One players Category:English footballers Category:English expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:National Premier Soccer League players Category:Lenoir–Rhyne Bears Category:Footballers from Greater London Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate association footballers in the Republic of Ireland Category:League of Ireland players Category:Finn Harps F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Cameron Saul
